title: Wanting to buy an American beauty 350 with frame.
author: mrdbrooks77

posts.post_title: Wanting to buy an American beauty 350 with frame.
posts.post_content:
Any condition common. Creases, pin holes, tears, missing paper is all ok. As long as the back looks ok. Pm me what you have. Also looking for 350 without frame, sweet caporal 350 460 factory 25 and cycle 460 to finish my back run. 

Sent from my SM-G920P using Tapatalk
